title: How to hire anywhere in the world (legally) | Finance Basics with Kruze Consultingâ€™s Scott Orn | E1326
description: Remote work unlocked massive hiring opportunities for startups, but also creates new compliance challenges. In this episode, Kruze Consulting COO Scott Orn joins to explain how startups should navigate remote work. They discuss PEOs, sales tax, and tax credits.
